EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Open a Personalization Intelligence App

View pipeline metrics in the Personalization Intelligence app.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To view Personalization Intelligence app metrics:	Personalization Intelligence User

The Personalization Intelligence app provides metrics and graphs for visualizing personalization pipeline data. You can filter all data by date or filter for specific personalization points.

The top section of the app shows total request and personalization point metrics. The middle section shows daily unique visitor metrics, and the bottom table contains metrics based on your filter selections. In the top section, clicking either Total Personalization Requests or Total Personalization Points toggles the view to show graphical data for that metric.

APP SECTION	METRICS	DESCRIPTION
Top	Total Personalization Requests	The total number of requests serviced by a personalization point or group of personalization points.
Total Personalization Points	The total number of unique personalization points serviced over the personalization pipeline.
Middle	Avg. Number of Unique Individuals / Day	The total number of unique personalization points serviced over the personalization pipeline.
Bottom	Personalization Point	The name assigned to the personalization point when it was created.
Personalization Point ID	An auto-generated ID assigned to the personalization point when it was created.
Personalization Decision	The name assigned to the personalization point when it was created.
Personalization Decision ID	An auto-generated ID assigned to the personalization decision when it was created.
Personalization Requests	The total number of personalization requests serviced by the personalization point within the selected timeframe.

When using the app filters, keep the following in mind:

The Date Range filter in the upper right-hand corner of the app is global. Modifying this filter changes the timeframe used to display all metrics in the app.
You can view Personalization Request or Personalization Point metrics for specific personalization points using the Personalization Point filter in the top section.
You can filter the data table in the bottom section to view data for a specific personalization point.

To open a Personalization Intelligence app:

On the Analytics Studio home page, search for Personalization Intelligence.
Locate the Personalization Intelligence app that you want to view.
To limit the search results, use the filters at the top of the page. You can also select the app page to view all Personalization Intelligence apps.
